column4: Firefox is already running, but is not responding. To open a new window, you must first close the existing Firefox process, or restart your system.

i want to start firefox, i get the message ""Firefox is already running, but is not responding. To open a new window, you must first close the existing Firefox process, or restart your system.", i try "sudo killall firefox" and i get "firefox: no process found"
aaah, life can be so easy ... thanks
